lead_paragraph: Is there any team more overlooked in these N.F.L. playoffs than the Colts? All they did was win the Super Bowl last season and repeat as American Football Conference South champions with a 13-3 record. It is worth noting that the A.F.C. South produced three playoff teams, each of which won at least 10 games. That has to be good training for the playoffs.
